N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 463.1 - Policy

State Regulations

This statement is intended to establish rules and regulations
as required under section
2880
of
the Public Authorities Law describing the prompt payment policy of the Power

Authority of the State of New York (the authority). Subject to the conditions
and exceptions set forth in section
2880
of
the Public Authorities Law and herein, in the event any proper invoice is not
paid promptly the authority shall be liable for the payment of interest on late
payments. This policy shall apply to all contracts entered into on or after

April 30, 1988. Notes
